org.elasticsearch.common.settings

Class ClusterSettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.elasticsearch.common.component.AbstractComponent
      • org.elasticsearch.common.settings.AbstractScopedSettings
        • org.elasticsearch.common.settings.ClusterSettings

  • public final class ClusterSettings
extends AbstractScopedSettings
    Encapsulates all valid cluster level settings.

    • Method Detail

      • applySettings

        public Settings applySettings(Settings newSettings)
        Description copied from class: AbstractScopedSettings
        Applies the given settings to all the settings consumers or to none of them. The settings will be merged with the node settings before they are applied while given settings override existing node settings.
        Overrides:
        applySettings in class AbstractScopedSettings
        Parameters:
        newSettings - the settings to apply
        Returns:
        the unmerged applied settings

      • hasDynamicSetting

        public boolean hasDynamicSetting(java.lang.String key)
        Description copied from class: AbstractScopedSettings
        Returns true if the setting for the given key is dynamically updateable. Otherwise false.
        Overrides:
        hasDynamicSetting in class AbstractScopedSettings

      • isLoggerSetting

        public boolean isLoggerSetting(java.lang.String key)
        Returns true if the settings is a logger setting.
